name: Pathfinder Name Generator
description: Embark on epic adventures with a truly unforgettable name! Our Pathfinder Name Generator conjures names worthy of heroes, villains, and everyone in between. Prepare to be amazed!
introduction: Tired of the same old fantasy names? Yearning for a moniker that resonates with the spirit of Pathfinder? Look no further! This generator is your trusty sidekick, crafting names brimming with lore, intrigue, and a touch of the fantastical. Whether you're rolling a noble paladin, a cunning rogue, or a wise wizard, we've got the perfect name waiting to be discovered.
howToUse: Behold! A brand new Pathfinder name appears, ready for adventure.
Don't like it? Click again! We've got enough names to fill Golarion.
Copy your favorite name and paste it into your character sheet. Instant backstory!
Share your awesome name with your fellow adventurers. Bragging rights are included.

faqs.question: What exactly *is* Pathfinder?
faqs.answer: Pathfinder is a thrilling tabletop role-playing game where you create characters and embark on fantastical adventures! Think dragons, dungeons, and dice… lots of dice!

faqs.question: Are these names suitable for all Pathfinder classes and races?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We've designed this generator to be versatile. Whether you're a halfling rogue or a towering orc barbarian, you'll find a name that fits perfectly. We even included a few that sound good for goblins!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Pathfinder character in a published adventure?
faqs.answer: Go for it! These names are free for you to use in your games. Just try not to name *every* NPC 'Bob'. That might get confusing.

faqs.question: How many names can this generator create?
faqs.answer: Theoretically, countless! We've combined prefixes and suffixes to create a vast pool of possibilities. You're more likely to run out of dice before you run out of names.

faqs.question: Will using this generator make me a better Pathfinder player?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee improved dice rolls, a cool name definitely adds to the immersion and enjoyment of the game. So, yes, indirectly, it will make you a better player. Plus, you'll look awesome doing it.

faqs.question: Is this generator powered by magic?
faqs.answer: It's powered by a combination of clever algorithms, a dash of fantasy inspiration, and a whole lot of caffeine. So, basically, yes, it's magic.
